content.text:
[@SandyG](@+McycRyGFiTqEL/mBlu0/RkdBOebqdOFySqCOEjwKx0=.ed25519) 

I think I've had this issue before! If you just want a single invite you can do:

```
sbot invite.create --external example.com
```

If you want to specify the number of invites, you'll have to use `-n` (or `--n`, I think). Definitely not intuitive, and the error doesn't help much either! I think this is what you want:

```
sbot invite.create -n 1 --external example.com
```

I've opened an issue [here](https://github.com/ssbc/scuttlebot/issues/553) for more helpful error messages in this case. Let me know if this gives you any trouble!
